title: Filters the input dataset. — filter_dataset

title: Creates an object of class mvnmm. — fit
code: fit(   dataset,   lineages,   columns = list(),   IS_values = list(),   k_interval = c(10, 30),   n_runs = 3,   steps = 500,   lr = 0.005,   covariance = "diag",   random_state = 25 )

title: Creates an object of class mvnmm. — fit
text: dataset Input dataset. shape NxT, N number observations T dimensionality dataset. lineages List lineages consideration. columns List columns selected dataset. specified, columns considered. IS_values List Insertion Sites identifier. must list length N, hence observation value needed. specified, general identifier .1,....N generated. k_interval Interval K values test. n_runs Number runs perform K. steps Maximum number steps inference. lr Learning rate used inference. covariance Covariance type Multivariate Gaussian. random_state Value seed.

title: Creates an object of class mvnmm. — fit
